channel.title: Login Help
channel.description:
Im pretty sure I Portfowarded right, and I have run.bat open and No-Ip up, but Only I can connect not my friends.
This is my PF Settings
Service Name ~ RsPrivateServer Service Type ~ TCP Starting Port ~ 43594 Ending Port ~ 43594
And IP is private.
No idea why noone can connect

item.title: Login Help
item.dc:creator: @Micker Micker
item.description:
@Micker wrote:

Residence:

On thing is that it could be there server i have this same problem but it might b because your logging into “localhost” / “127.0.0.1” because that is what happend to me then i went into server, or client searched for an ip or in your case if its logging into local host is to seach for that in your server and client and both server and client in both of them then change it to your ip then you might have some luck and log in but you have the same problem as me so i hope you luck ,

did u ever fix it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 08:13:07 pm[/size][hr]So no one knows how to fix this o-o?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 09:26:49 pm[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

On thing is that it could be there server i have this same problem but it might b because your logging into “localhost” / “127.0.0.1” because that is what happend to me then i went into server, or client searched for an ip or in your case if its logging into local host is to seach for that in your server and client and both server and client in both of them then change it to your ip then you might have some luck and log in but you have the same problem as me so i hope you luck ,

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help
item.dc:creator: @Micker Micker
item.description:
@Micker wrote:

[quote=“God11, post:3, topic:293895”][quote author=IfearI link=topic=388824.msg2906122#msg2906122 date=1249811920]

Im pretty sure I Portfowarded right, and I have run.bat open and No-Ip up, but Only I can connect not my friends.

This is my PF Settings

Service Name ~ RsPrivateServer
Service Type ~ TCP
Starting Port ~ 43594
Ending Port ~ 43594

And IP is private.

No idea why noone can connect

Try to login with the same ip as your friends…

if you can’t login it’s the ip
[/quote]
its not the ip he must of portforwared wrong cause i couldnt connect to his server.[/quote]

I checked my PF about 6 times im positive its not it.

Read full topic
